mapper.insert: insert into trans_log (trans_type, amount, raw_amount, date, status, description,vendor_id, datasets_id) VALUES (#{trans_type}, #{amount}, #{raw_amount}, #{date}, #{status}, #{description}, #{vendor_id}, #{datasets_id})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(amount * trans_type) FROM trans_log Where vendor_id = #{vendor_id}
SELECT count(id) from trans_log where vendor_id = #{vendor_id} and datasets_id > 0;
